title.rendered: We’re a finalist in The Drum Agency Business Awards 2019!

content.rendered:
It’s been an exciting year here at Harrison Carloss – from our acquisition back in January to our newest recruits joining the team – it’s safe to say 2019 has been our year! And, as a cherry on top of the cake, we’re happy to announce we are a finalist of the prestigious The Drum Agency Business Awards 2019!

We impressed the judges with our entry to the Marketing Agency of the Year award for agencies with 50 or fewer staff, detailing the brilliant work we have done in our 40 year history and the innovation we continue to bring to the marketing scene.

What is The Drum?

The Drum is Europe’s largest media and marketing website, attracting over 1.4 million unique users and over 200,00 social followers each month. They pride themselves on helping businesses make informed decisions about their marketing and showcasing the best of the best.

Their Drum Agency Business Awards looks to celebrate the very best run agencies in the country (including us!) with the aim to make it easier for businesses to trust the people they depend on for advice.

We’ve been busy

Just a year ago, Staffordshire’s oldest established and longest running creative agency became part of My Clever Group and changed its name to Harrison Carloss.

Yet so much more than simply changing our name, we began a profound and total transformation that saw a restructuring in every part of our operation.

We have built on our offering with world class digital, app development, data analytics and cloud based software solutions, and with 40 years of creative successes behind us, we settled into fantastic new premises and set about completely transforming our services right across creative, web and digital.

Celebrate good times (c’mon!)

We’re incredibly proud of the whole team, as well as the amazing clients we’ve worked with who have allowed us to showcase our talents, and have a lot of fun doing it! We can’t wait to join the other finalists at the awards ceremony in London on the 26th November for what is certain to be a brilliant night. Watch this space, folks!

For more information about our award nominated work, get in touch with the team and see how we can help your business.
